statements: SELECT * FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from='USD' AND currency_to='EUR';
SELECT id, currency_from, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT currency_to, currency_from, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from='GBP' ORDER BY currency_to ASC;
SELECT exchange_rate, currency_to, currency_from FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from='EUR' OR currency_to='JPY';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_from DESC
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD' AND currency_to = 'EUR'
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from LIKE 'US%' ORDER BY currency_to ASC
SELECT DISTINCT currency_from FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0
SELECT currency_from, AVG(exchange_rate) AS avg_rate FROM exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_from
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT currency_from, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_from DESC;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions WHERE currency_code = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5 ORDER BY currency_from DESC, currency_to ASC
SELECT id, currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE currency_code='USD' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT currency_from, currency_to, AVG(exchange_rate) AS average_rate FROM currency_exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_from, currency_to HAVING AVG(exchange_rate) < 1.2 ORDER BY currency_from, currency_to
SELECT DISTINCT currency_code FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT amount, currency, exchange_rate, converted_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT code, name FROM currencies WHERE code = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, converted_amount FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'EUR';
SELECT currency_from, AVG(exchange_rate) AS average_rate FROM exchange_rates GROUP BY currency_from;

SELECT currencies.name, exchange_rates.currency_from, transactions.amount, transactions.converted_amount FROM currencies JOIN exchange_rates ON currencies.code = exchange_rates.currency_to JOIN transactions ON currencies.code = transactions.currency;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_to = 'EUR';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency_from FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_from = 'USD';
SELECT currency_from, exchange_rate FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY exchange_rate DESC;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, conversion_amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency_from = 'EUR' AND currency_to = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE country_name LIKE '%Europe%';
SELECT country_name, currency_code FROM currencies c JOIN countries co ON c.country_name = co.country_name WHERE co.country_code = 'US';
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_code, usd_rate, eur_rate FROM exchange_rates;
SELECT currency_code, gbp_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE usd_rate > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT currency_code, usd_rate, eur_rate, gbp_rate FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY currency_code DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.username, countries.country_name, transactions.amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.transaction_id JOIN countries ON users.user_id = countries.country_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC;

SELECT log_id, transaction_logs.log_message, users.username FROM transaction_logs JOIN users ON transaction_logs.user_id = users.user_id WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT country_name, AVG(exchange_rate) AS avg_exchange_rate FROM countries JOIN transactions ON countries.country_id = transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY country_name HAVING avg_exchange_rate > 1 ORDER BY avg_exchange_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
